name: Moshi Monsters - Moshlings Theme Park [3DS]
description:
The Moshlings have lost their way around Amusement Isle and they need your help to round up their monster-mates and light up the magical Moshlings Theme Park.

Features

• Find the Lost Moshlings: With 60 Moshlings to find, players get to embark on exciting Moshi Missions to locate and reunite our Moshi friends. Play mini-games to unlock hints and tips to help you in your search.
• Fun for all ages!: Suitable for a wide range of gamers, with easy-to-learn games and Moshi nuture modes for the youngest gamer, as well as exploration puzzles and arcade challenges for the more advanced.
